00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 // Function: DiagramColumnLayout()
00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 DiagramColumnLayout::DiagramColumnLayout(GenericEditProvider& editProvider,
00026                                          QGraphicsScene* scene) : editProvider_(editProvider),
00027                                                                   scene_(scene), columns_(),
00028                                                                   layoutWidth_(0.0), offsetY_(0)
00029 {
00030 }
00031 
00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 // Function: ~DiagramColumnLayout()
00034 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 DiagramColumnLayout::~DiagramColumnLayout()
00036 {
00037     columns_.clear();
00038 }
00039 
00040 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // Function: addColumn()
00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 void DiagramColumnLayout::addColumn(QString const& name, ColumnContentType contentType,
00044                                     unsigned int allowedItems)
00045 {
00046     // Create the diagram column and position it accordingly.
00047     DiagramColumn* column = new DiagramColumn(name, contentType, allowedItems, this);
00048     column->setPos(layoutWidth_, 0.0);
00049 
00050     addColumn(column);
00051 }
00052 
00053 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 //  Function: addColumn()
00055 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void DiagramColumnLayout::addColumn(DiagramColumn* column)
00057 {
00058     if (column->scene() == 0)
00059     {
00060         scene_->addItem(column);
00061     }
00062 
00063     column->setOffsetY(offsetY_);
00064 
00065     connect(column, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00066 
00067     // Add the column to the list of columns and update the layout width.
00068     columns_.append(column);
00069     layoutWidth_ += column->boundingRect().width();
00070 
00071     // Update the position in the layout.
00072     HStackedLayout::updateItemMove(columns_, column);
00073     HStackedLayout::setItemPos(columns_, column, 0.0);
00074 
00075     emit contentChanged();
00076 }
00077 
00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 // Function: addItem()
00080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 void DiagramColumnLayout::addItem(QGraphicsItem* item)
00082 {
00083     for (int i = 0; i < columns_.size(); ++i)
00084     {
00085         if (columns_.at(i)->isItemAllowed(item))
00086         {
00087             columns_.at(i)->addItem(item);
00088             break;
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 // Function: removeColumn()
00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 void DiagramColumnLayout::removeColumn(DiagramColumn* column)
00097 {
00098     if (columns_.removeAll(column) > 0)
00099     {
00100         layoutWidth_ -= column->boundingRect().width();
00101         HStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(columns_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00102         scene_->removeItem(column);
00103 
00104         emit contentChanged();
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 // Function: removeColumn()
00110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void DiagramColumnLayout::removeColumn(int index)
00112 {
00113     columns_.removeAt(index);
00114     HStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(columns_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00115 
00116     emit contentChanged();
00117 }
00118 
00119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 // Function: findColumnAt()
00121 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 DiagramColumn* DiagramColumnLayout::findColumnAt(QPointF pt)
00123 {
00124     for (int i = 0; i < columns_.size(); ++i)
00125     {
00126         // The point is inside the column if the x coordinate is within it (y can be anything).
00127         if (pt.x() >= columns_.at(i)->sceneBoundingRect().left() &&
00128             pt.x() < columns_.at(i)->sceneBoundingRect().right())
00129         {
00130             return columns_.at(i);
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     return 0;
00135 }
00136 
00137 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 // Function: onMoveColumn()
00139 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 void DiagramColumnLayout::onMoveColumn(DiagramColumn* column)
00141 {
00142     // Clamp the coordinates.
00143     QPointF pos = column->pos();
00144     pos.setY(0.0);
00145     pos.setX(std::max(std::min(pos.x(), layoutWidth_ - (column->boundingRect().width())), 0.0));
00146     column->setPos(pos);
00147     column->update();
00148 
00149     HStackedLayout::updateItemMove(columns_, column);
00150 }
00151 
00152 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 // Function: onReleaseColumn()
00154 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00155 void DiagramColumnLayout::onReleaseColumn(DiagramColumn* column)
00156 {
00157     HStackedLayout::setItemPos(columns_, column, 0.0);
00158 }
00159 
00160 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 // Function: setOffsetY()
00162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 void DiagramColumnLayout::setOffsetY(qreal y)
00164 {
00165     for (int i = 0; i < columns_.size(); ++i)
00166     {
00167         columns_.at(i)->setOffsetY(y);
00168     }
00169 
00170     offsetY_ = y;
00171 }
00172 
00173 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 // Function: getColumns()
00175 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 QList<DiagramColumn*> const& DiagramColumnLayout::getColumns() const
00177 {
00178     return columns_;
00179 }
00180 
00181 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 // Function: updateColumnPositions()
00183 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 void DiagramColumnLayout::updateColumnPositions()
00185 {    
00186     HStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(columns_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00187 }
00188 
00189 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 // Function: getEditProvider()
00191 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 GenericEditProvider& DiagramColumnLayout::getEditProvider()
00193 {
00194     return editProvider_;
00195 }
